modules.longDescription: Framework-specific patterns for Next.js App Router. Covers Server Components, Client Components, Server Actions, route handlers, and data fetching.

modules.name: Astro Patterns
modules.description: Astro framework patterns and best practices
modules.longDescription: Framework-specific patterns for Astro. Covers pages, layouts, islands architecture, content collections, and API routes.

Creates API routes for server functionality
modules.whenToUse: When building content-focused websites with Astro.

modules.name: TanStack Start Patterns
modules.description: TanStack Start framework patterns and best practices
modules.longDescription: Framework-specific patterns for TanStack Start. Covers file-based routing, loaders, server functions, search params, and error handling.
modules.whenToUse: When building full-stack applications with TanStack Start.

modules.name: TDD Methodology
modules.description: Test-Driven Development methodology and practices
modules.longDescription: Comprehensive guide to Test-Driven Development (TDD) using the Red-Green-Refactor cycle. Covers writing failing tests first, implementing minimal code to pass, and refactoring for quality.
whatItDoes: Defines TDD cycle: Red → Green → Refactor
Provides test naming conventions and patterns
Includes edge case and boundary testing
Guides on test isolation and mocking
modules.whenToUse: Essential for any project following TDD practices. Use when writing new features or fixing bugs.

modules.name: BDD Methodology
modules.description: Behavior-Driven Development with Gherkin syntax and collaborative specifications
modules.longDescription: Comprehensive guide to Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) using Gherkin syntax. Covers collaborative specification, Given-When-Then scenarios, and living documentation.
whatItDoes: Defines BDD cycle: Discovery → Formulation → Automation
Creates Gherkin feature files with scenarios
Implements step definitions for test automation
modules.whenToUse: When business stakeholders need to understand tests, for complex business rules, and when creating living documentation.

modules.name: ATDD Methodology
modules.description: Acceptance Test-Driven Development focusing on user acceptance criteria
modules.longDescription: Comprehensive guide to Acceptance Test-Driven Development (ATDD). Covers writing acceptance tests before implementation based on user stories and business requirements.
whatItDoes: Defines ATDD cycle: Discuss → Distill → Develop → Demo
Creates acceptance tests from user stories
Ensures acceptance criteria are fully covered
modules.whenToUse: When acceptance criteria must be verified, stakeholder sign-off is required, or for complex business workflows.

modules.name: Clean Architecture
modules.description: Clean Architecture with concentric layers and dependency inversion
modules.longDescription: Clean Architecture organizing code in concentric layers where dependencies point inward. The core business logic remains independent of external concerns like databases, UI, or frameworks.
whatItDoes: Defines concentric layer structure (Entities → Use Cases → Interfaces → Frameworks)
Uses dependency injection for all external services
modules.whenToUse: For large applications with complex business logic, when high testability is required, or when framework independence is important.

modules.name: Hexagonal Architecture
modules.description: Hexagonal Architecture (Ports and Adapters) for loosely coupled applications
modules.longDescription: Hexagonal Architecture (Ports and Adapters) creating loosely coupled components connected to their environment via ports and adapters. The application core is isolated from external concerns.
whatItDoes: Creates adapters for each external technology
Implements core domain with clean boundaries
Enables easy swapping of infrastructure components
Supports multiple entry points (REST, CLI, GraphQL)
modules.whenToUse: For integration-heavy applications, microservices, or when easy adapter swapping is needed.

modules.name: Vertical Slice Architecture
modules.description: Vertical Slice Architecture organizing code by feature instead of layers
modules.longDescription: Vertical Slice Architecture organizing code by feature (vertical slices) rather than technical layers (horizontal slices). Each feature contains everything it needs: handlers, validators, DTOs, and data access.
whatItDoes: Organizes code by feature instead of technical layer
Minimizes cross-cutting changes for new features
Favors explicit duplication over wrong abstraction
Enables independent feature development and testing
modules.whenToUse: For feature-rich applications, when teams work on separate features, or when preparing for microservices decomposition.

modules.name: Web App Testing
modules.description: Web application testing strategies with Playwright/Vitest
modules.longDescription: End-to-end testing strategies for web applications using Playwright and Testing Library. Covers component testing, integration testing, and full E2E flows.
whatItDoes: Covers component testing with Testing Library
modules.whenToUse: When building web applications that need E2E testing. Works with React, Vue, Astro, and other frameworks.

modules.name: API Testing
modules.description: API testing strategies with Vitest and Supertest
modules.longDescription: Testing strategies for REST APIs including unit tests, integration tests, and contract testing. Covers request validation, response assertions, and error handling.
modules.whenToUse: When building backend APIs with Hono, Express, Fastify, or other Node.js frameworks.

modules.name: Performance Testing
modules.description: Performance testing, benchmarking, and optimization
modules.longDescription: Performance testing methodologies including load testing, stress testing, and benchmarking. Covers identifying bottlenecks, measuring response times, and optimizing performance.
modules.whenToUse: When you need to ensure your application can handle expected load and meets performance requirements.

modules.name: Security Testing
modules.description: Security testing and vulnerability assessment
modules.longDescription: Security testing practices covering OWASP Top 10, penetration testing basics, and vulnerability scanning. Focuses on identifying and preventing common security issues.
modules.whenToUse: Essential for any application handling user data or sensitive information. Use before production deployment.

modules.name: QA Criteria Validator
modules.description: Quality assurance criteria validation checklist
modules.longDescription: Validation checklist for ensuring features meet quality standards before release. Covers functionality, edge cases, performance, and user experience.
modules.whenToUse: Before marking any feature as complete. Essential for maintaining quality standards.

modules.name: Security Audit
modules.description: Comprehensive security audit procedures and checklists
modules.longDescription: Complete security audit framework covering code review, dependency scanning, configuration review, and compliance verification. Provides actionable remediation steps.
modules.whenToUse: Before major releases, after security incidents, or as part of regular security reviews.

modules.name: Performance Audit
modules.description: Performance audit and optimization recommendations
modules.longDescription: Performance audit framework for web applications covering Lighthouse metrics, bundle analysis, rendering performance, and backend optimization opportunities.
whatItDoes: Audits Core Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS)
Analyzes bundle size and code splitting
Identifies N+1 queries and DB issues
modules.whenToUse: When application feels slow, before major launches, or during performance optimization sprints.

modules.name: Accessibility Audit

modules.longDescription: Accessibility audit procedures following WCAG 2.1 guidelines. Covers keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, color contrast, and semantic HTML.

modules.name: i18n Patterns

modules.longDescription: Expert patterns for internationalization in React and Next.js applications. Covers next-intl and react-i18next setup, translation file management, pluralization, formatting, and RTL support.
